quote: Nothing tends more to cement the hearts of Christians than praying together. Never do they love one another so well as when they witness the outpouring of each other's hearts in prayer.
quote_letters: NOTHING TENDS MORE TO CEMENT THE HEARTS OF CHRISTIANS THAN PRAYING TOGETHER NEVER DO THEY LOVE ONE ANOTHER SO WELL AS WHEN THEY WITNESS THE OUTPOURING OF EACH OTHERS HEARTS IN PRAYER
